name: The1stMovement
description: The1stMovement is an award-winning full service digital agency responsible for creating many innovative digital campaigns for Fortune 500 companies including Adobe, AT&T, Cisco, Sun Microsystems, Viacom, and more. With offices in Los Angeles and Denver, The1stMovement's team offers innovative solutions to our clients' advertising challenges. While others lead with creativity, we lead with our mastery of technology to better tell your story.
